name: Stomachalla
description:
A fast-paced hack n' slash game where you play as a pork chop inside Odin's Stomach fighting the waves of "hunger" that dwell there.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Face diverse types of enemies with different kind of characteristics like speed, strength, melee and ranged attacks.

Cut those waves down with your axe, gathering power ups and get the highest score!

Customize your pork chop and make it your own!

How to play?

WASD - Move

Left Click - SLASH!!!!

Spacebar - Pause Menu

_______________________________________________________________________________________

An experience that's part of the AWESOME Totem Collective: Totem Explorer (totem-explorer.com)

Totem is an unique game development collective that unites creators and players around an universe of interconnected game experiences! Check Stomachalla's Totem site: Totem Explorer (totem-explorer.com)

DISCLAIMER: THIS GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT. EVERYTHING THAT YOU SEE ON THIS PROTOTYPE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE.

Stomachalla is a game created by Frame 3 Studio in Costa Rica. Visit us at www.frame3studio.com
